languages.text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам. Проктор Антар отправился на небольшую тренировку со своим верным кибермастифом и остался доволен результатами. Правда, по словам очевидцев, эта тренировка была несколько странной — арбитр просто сидел на краю зеркального плато рядом со своим псом, безмолвно глядя вдаль.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.
languages.original_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам. Проктор Антар отправился на небольшую тренировку со своим верным кибермастифом и остался доволен результатами. Правда, по словам очевидцев, эта тренировка была несколько странной — арбитр просто сидел на краю зеркального плато рядом со своим псом, безмолвно глядя вдаль.

traits.locale_text: The walk was peaceful and memorable for the officers. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

The walk was peaceful and memorable for the officers. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

languages.text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Proktor Anthar führte eine kurze Trainingssitzung mit seinem treuen Cyber-Mastiff durch und war mit den Ergebnissen zufrieden. Augenzeugen hingegen berichteten, dass das Ganze recht seltsam war – der Arbitrator saß lediglich auf dem Rand der Spiegelplatte neben seinem Hund und starrte schweigend in die Ferne.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

traits.locale_text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Proktor Anthar führte eine kurze Trainingssitzung mit seinem treuen Cyber-Mastiff durch und war mit den Ergebnissen zufrieden. Augenzeugen hingegen berichteten, dass das Ganze recht seltsam war – der Arbitrator saß lediglich auf dem Rand der Spiegelplatte neben seinem Hund und starrte schweigend in die Ferne.

languages.text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Le proctor Anthar en a profité pour effectuer une petite séance d'entraînement avec son cyber-mastiff, dont il est ressorti satisfait. Cependant, les témoins de la scène rapportent une séance étrange : l'arbitrator s'est contenté de s'asseoir au bord du plateau aux côtés de son chien, tous deux observant l'horizon silencieusement.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

traits.locale_text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Le proctor Anthar en a profité pour effectuer une petite séance d'entraînement avec son cyber-mastiff, dont il est ressorti satisfait. Cependant, les témoins de la scène rapportent une séance étrange : l'arbitrator s'est contenté de s'asseoir au bord du plateau aux côtés de son chien, tous deux observant l'horizon silencieusement.

languages.text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。安萨监察官与他忠实的生化獒犬进行了短暂的训练，取得了令人满意的成果。不过，据目击者声称，整个训练过程相当古怪。安萨监察官仅仅是坐在镜像高原边缘，身边坐着他的狗，一人一犬默默欣赏着远方的美景。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

traits.locale_text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。安萨监察官与他忠实的生化獒犬进行了短暂的训练，取得了令人满意的成果。不过，据目击者声称，整个训练过程相当古怪。安萨监察官仅仅是坐在镜像高原边缘，身边坐着他的狗，一人一犬默默欣赏着远方的美景。
对众多军官而言，这是场宁静、难忘的散步。安萨监察官与他忠实的生化獒犬进行了短暂的训练，取得了令人满意的成果。不过，据目击者声称，整个训练过程相当古怪。安萨监察官仅仅是坐在镜像高原边缘，身边坐着他的狗，一人一犬默默欣赏着远方的美景。

languages.text: El permiso transcurrió sin incidentes y fue motivo de conversación para los oficiales durante varias semanas. El Procurador Anthar emprendió una breve sesión de entrenamiento con su cibermastín y quedó satisfecho. Sin embargo, los testigos afirman que fue un proceso extraño: el Arbitrator se limitó a sentarse con su perro al borde de la meseta espejo, mirando a la distancia en silencio.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

traits.locale_text: El permiso transcurrió sin incidentes y fue motivo de conversación para los oficiales durante varias semanas. El Procurador Anthar emprendió una breve sesión de entrenamiento con su cibermastín y quedó satisfecho. Sin embargo, los testigos afirman que fue un proceso extraño: el Arbitrator se limitó a sentarse con su perro al borde de la meseta espejo, mirando a la distancia en silencio.

languages.text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく過ぎ去り、船の士官たちはその間の出来事について数週間語り合った。アンサール代理人は忠実なサイバーマスチフと共に短い訓練を行い、その結果に満足していた。しかし、目撃者によると、その訓練はアービトレイターは単に犬の隣で鏡のような台地の端に座り、静かに遠くを見つめるだけの、どこか奇妙なものだった。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

traits.locale_text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく過ぎ去り、船の士官たちはその間の出来事について数週間語り合った。アンサール代理人は忠実なサイバーマスチフと共に短い訓練を行い、その結果に満足していた。しかし、目撃者によると、その訓練はアービトレイターは単に犬の隣で鏡のような台地の端に座り、静かに遠くを見つめるだけの、どこか奇妙なものだった。
その散歩は士官たちにとって平和で記憶に残るものだった。アンサール代理人は忠実なサイバーマスチフと共に短い訓練を行い、その結果に満足していた。しかし、目撃者によると、その訓練はアービトレイターは単に犬の隣で鏡のような台地の端に座り、静かに遠くを見つめるだけの、どこか奇妙なものだった。

languages.text: İniş sonrasında hiçbir sorun yaşanmıyor ve gemi subayları, sonrasında haftalarca buradan bahsediyor. Üsteğmen Anthar, sadık siber mastifiyle kısa bir talim seansına çıkıp sonuçtan memnun kalıyor. Ne var ki görgü tanıkları, talimin epey tuhaf olduğunu ifade ediyor: Yargıcı, aynalı yaylanın kenarına oturup köpeğinin yanında sessizce ufka bakmakla yetiniyor.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Proctor Anthar went for a short training session with his faithful cyber-mastiff and was satisfied with the results. However, according to eyewitnesses, the training session was rather strange — the Arbitrator simply sat on the edge of the mirrored plateau next to his dog, silently staring into the distance.

traits.locale_text: İniş sonrasında hiçbir sorun yaşanmıyor ve gemi subayları, sonrasında haftalarca buradan bahsediyor. Üsteğmen Anthar, sadık siber mastifiyle kısa bir talim seansına çıkıp sonuçtan memnun kalıyor. Ne var ki görgü tanıkları, talimin epey tuhaf olduğunu ifade ediyor: Yargıcı, aynalı yaylanın kenarına oturup köpeğinin yanında sessizce ufka bakmakla yetiniyor.

Yürüyüş, subaylar için huzurlu ve unutulmaz geçti. Üsteğmen Anthar, sadık siber mastifiyle kısa bir talim seansına çıktı ve sonuçtan memnun kaldı. Ne var ki görgü tanıklarına göre talim epey tuhaftı. Yargıcı, aynalı yaylanın kenarına oturup köpeğinin yanında sessizce ufka bakmaktan başka bir şey yapmamıştı.
